section.para: To view Customers by Characteristic, select the "Customers by Characteristic" option from the "Displays" menu. The following screen will appear:
When displaying Customers by Characteristic, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Select a Characteristic from the list of Characteristics designated as being available for use as Customer Characteristics. If you query with only this field set, you will see a list of all Customers who are either using or are eligible to use this Characteristic (i.e., because their Customer Type supports a Characteristic Profile).

Select to include only those Customers with a specific value assigned to the specified Characteristic. If selected, the report will include only those Customers who are using the Characteristic with a defined value.
Enter a Characteristic value to view Customers who have been assigned the Characteristic and value combination.
Select this option to include Customers who are using the specified Characteristic, but with an empty value.
Select to include inactive Customers in the display.
Display lists Customers who have been assigned the Characteristic and value combination.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen, returning you to the application desktop.

Runs the report associated with this screen.
